articles.title: Latin America and Caribbean surpass million COVID-19 deaths - CNA
articles.description: More than one million people have died of Covid-19 in Latin America and the Caribbean since the coronavirus pandemic began, according to an AFP count based on official figures as of Friday at 2105 GMT.
articles.content: MONTEVIDEO: More than one million people have died of COVID-19 in Latin America and the Caribbean since the coronavirus pandemic began, according to an AFP count based on official figures as of Frida… [+2324 chars]

articles.title: Jewish American groups appeal to Biden White House after string of antisemitic attacks related to Israel - Washington Post
articles.description: U.S. Jews grew concerned in recent years as far-right extremism grew. Now Mideast violence is prompting a different threat.
